name: God's Playground
description:
The game:

Something fun i thought of just before the brackeys jam, i actually had lots of fun making it, so i might just continue with some more endings if i feel like it.

The game has 4 endings, all bad, idk why i didn't make a good ending but here we are. 

I'll stop writing here to avoid the novel this is going to turn into but please comment something, even if you have nothing to say at all.

OH YEAH and the game freezes after an ending, because it is supposed to close but just does not seem to do that in the web version...
